subtitle:
1 00:00:13,200 --> 00:00:18,500 Lâi-lâi-lâi-lâi, lô-siaⁿ kó͘-siaⁿ hiáng sì-piⁿ
Come, come! Gongs and drums echo all around. 2 00:00:18,500 --> 00:00:22,800 Hiān-chāi chóng chhiáⁿ lia̍t-ūi chèng hiaⁿ-tī
Now I invite all you brothers here today. 3 00:00:22,800 --> 00:00:26,900 Gún chi̍t kiâⁿ gō͘-la̍k-cha̍p miâ
Our traveling troupe has fifty or sixty guys. 4 00:00:27,300 --> 00:00:32,100 Ūi-tio̍h miâ-siaⁿ piàⁿ-sìⁿ-miā
Risking our lives for the sake of fame. 5 00:00:32,100 --> 00:00:37,800 Ah~ chhiáⁿ lín kín lâi khòaⁿ
Ah~ please come and watch quickly! 6 00:00:37,800 --> 00:00:43,500 Liû-lōng kang-ô͘ ê ngē-nńg ê kang-hu
The hard and soft skills of the wandering world. 7 00:00:43,500 --> 00:00:49,500 Kín-lâi kín-lâi kín-lâi--lah
Come quick, come quick, come quick! 8 00:00:54,300 --> 00:00:56,800 Sio̍k-gú teh kóng
As the old saying goes: 9 00:00:56,600 --> 00:01:00,100 Lâng chē oē to̍h chē, sam-sek-lâng kóng gō͘-sek-oē
More people means more gossip; three kinds of people speak five kinds of words. 10 00:01:00,100 --> 00:01:04,800 Ū-lâng ài chia̍h chhài-koe, ah ū-lâng ài khó͘-koe
Some love loofah, while others love bitter melon. 11 00:01:04,800 --> 00:01:10,200 Ū-lâng ài khòaⁿ lāng-lâu, ah ū-lâng ài khòaⁿ phah-kûn-thâu
Some love acrobatics, and some love watching fist-fighting. 12 00:01:09,500 --> 00:01:11,800 Nā ài khòaⁿ kûn-thâu, bián-kiaⁿ bô
If you love fist-fighting, fear not there’s none. 13 00:01:11,800 --> 00:01:15,100 Ji̍t-pún Le̍k-tō-san sī hó-chhiú-to kiam jiû-tō
Japan's Rikidōzan is a master of Karate chops and Judo. 14 00:01:15,100 --> 00:01:19,100 Ah nā Bí-kok phīⁿ-á tok-tok, ba̍k-chiu lô-lô
And the Americans with their high noses and deep-set eyes... 15 00:01:19,100 --> 00:01:24,000 I nā beh phah nn̄g-pō͘ ah, kóng-tio̍h ài bo̍k-sìng-gù chiah sǹg ē hô
If they strike a pose, it has to be "Boxing" to count as a match. 16 00:01:24,000 --> 00:01:26,500 Ìn-tō͘ o͘ kap tōa-kho͘ thong-lâng chai
India's "Black and Big" is known to all. 17 00:01:26,600 --> 00:01:29,700 Nā Tiong-kok Ta̍t-mô ê kang-hu siōng lī-hāi
But China's Bodhidharma Kung Fu is the most powerful. 18 00:01:29,700 --> 00:01:31,700 Ah nā sió-tī chin put-châi
As for me, your humble brother, I have no talent. 19 00:01:31,700 --> 00:01:33,800 Pak-tó͘ nā iau choân pō͘-sò͘
When my belly is hungry, I have full strategies. 20 00:01:33,900 --> 00:01:37,400 Iā pak-tó͘ nā pá to̍h bô-pòaⁿ-pō͘
But when my belly is full, I haven't got a single move! 21 00:01:37,400 --> 00:01:38,500 Lâi khòaⁿ
Come watch! 22 00:01:38,500 --> 00:01:41,600 Thài-chó͘-kûn phah ngē-ki
Taizu Fist strikes the hard limbs. 23 00:01:41,700 --> 00:01:44,500 Pe̍h-ho̍h-kûn sī chhiūⁿ môa-chî
White Crane Fist is soft like mochi. 24 00:01:44,500 --> 00:01:46,800 Kâu-kûn sī hó kha-chhiú
Monkey Fist has good technique. 25 00:01:46,900 --> 00:01:48,100 Káu-kûn sī chia̍h ba̍k-chiu
Dog Fist attacks the eyes. 26 00:01:48,100 --> 00:01:52,000 Tah... Phah chi̍t pō͘ thun-kim pàng-kah khí-chhiú lo̍h-chhah
Hah! Watch this move: Swallow Gold, Release Armor, raise hand, plunge down! 27 00:01:52,000 --> 00:01:54,100 Oeh, chit pō͘ kha-chhiú ài siak-phah
Hey, this move needs a forceful snap! 28 00:01:54,100 --> 00:01:57,700 Nā-bô ē kán-ná chhin-chhiūⁿ bîn-chhn̂g-téng tī-leh thiàu Lûn-pah
Otherwise, it looks just like dancing the Rumba on a bed. 29 00:01:57,700 --> 00:01:59,800 Lâi, kang-hu nā beh hó
Come, if you want good Kung Fu... 30 00:01:59,800 --> 00:02:01,100 To̍h lán pún-tó
It's right here on our island. 31 00:02:01,100 --> 00:02:02,500 Nā beh ē to̍h lán kuì-tē
If you want to train, it's our honored place. 32 00:02:02,500 --> 00:02:04,600 Nā beh gâu to̍h lán tē-thâu
If you want to be skilled, it's our territory. 33 00:02:04,600 --> 00:02:07,200 Sió-tī nn̄g-saⁿ-pō͘ phiàn-chia̍h-pō͘
I only have a few tricks to make a living. 34 00:02:07,200 --> 00:02:07,900 Bāng kok-ūi to-to chí-kàu
I hope everyone will give me much advice. 35 00:02:07,900 --> 00:02:11,500 To-to chí-kàu lah
Give me much advice! 36 00:02:17,700 --> 00:02:22,500 Lâi-lâi-lâi-lâi, kim-ji̍t iú-iân lâi siong-hông
Come, come! Fate brings us together today. 37 00:02:22,500 --> 00:02:27,900 Bêng-ji̍t chiū beh koh chài oāⁿ pa̍t-ūi
Tomorrow we must move to another place. 38 00:02:27,900 --> 00:02:32,800 Thài-chó͘-kûn chhiūⁿ thih-ki
Taizu Fist is like an iron bar. 39 00:02:32,800 --> 00:02:37,500 Pe̍h-ho̍h-kûn sī chhiūⁿ môa-chî
White Crane Fist is soft like mochi. 40 00:02:37,800 --> 00:02:43,200 Ah~ chhiáⁿ lín kín lâi khòaⁿ
Ah~ please come and watch quickly! 41 00:02:43,200 --> 00:02:48,500 Liû-lōng kang-ô͘ ê ngē-nńg ê kang-hu
The hard and soft skills of the wandering world. 42 00:02:48,500 --> 00:02:55,000 Kín-lâi kín-lâi kín-lâi--lah
Come quick, come quick, come quick!
